title: Arrange Vessel Bunkering
description: A shipping agent requests to arrange for fuel (bunkering) for their vessel while it is at berth.

tasks.description: Receive the bunkering request, including the type and quantity of fuel required.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator logs the request for 500 metric tons of VLSFO.

tasks.description: Contact the licensed bunker barge supplier to confirm availability and schedule the service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator schedules the bunkering service with 'Port Fuel Supplies' for the requested time.

tasks.description: Notify the harbormaster and HSSE department of the scheduled bunkering operation for safety oversight.
tasks.expected_outcome: All relevant internal departments are informed of the operation.
